How to recognise invasive #mosquito species? What for?

We have just launched a new tool - for specialists in the field and those who are not specialists yet.

Take a look at our "Reverse identification key for invasive mosquito species" here: https://t.co/xy0AHdEuTP https://t.co/w0dcQuPrBJ

Why is being able to differentiate species so important?

To make sure the surveillance of mosquito-borne diseases like #malaria, #dengue or #WestNileFever is on track!

More on mosquito-borne diseases here: https://t.co/nRN0ASXsYY

Check the tool here: https://t.co/xy0AHdEuTP
More people are getting involved in the surveillance of invasive #mosquito species in the EU/EEA, not just professionals with formal training in #entomology. https://t.co/UtjWXUM2W9
Our key provides the non-specialist with reference material to help recognise an invasive mosquito species, displaying 6 invasive and 9 native species present in the EU/EEA. https://t.co/9iDjLDkZf7

There are many taxonomic keys available for identifying #mosquitoes of medical and veterinary importance, but they are almost all designed for professionally trained #entomologists. https://t.co/J7TZ52yRC5
